articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: R Packages
articles.description: A new article created using the Distill format.
articles.contents: In an effort to promote collaboration on analytical projects and facilitate code replicability, we’ve developed R Packages and encourage the use of git / github as a version control tool. These packages are primarily used and maintained by OHA/HQ staff but remain accessible to other analysts across the bureau, the agency, abroad. tierdrop

articles.title: USAID South Africa - Strategic Information
articles.description: Welcome! This website serves as a repository of tools and project utilized by the USAID South Africa SI team for data analytics and processing of MER/PEPFAR data.
